video.title: Peaky Blinders
video.synopsis: A notorious gang in 1919 Birmingham, England, is led by the fierce Tommy Shelby, a crime boss set on moving up in the world no matter the cost.

episodes.synopsis: Ambitious gang leader Thomas Shelby recognizes an opportunity to move up in the world thanks to a missing crate of guns.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Thomas provokes a local kingpin by fixing a horse race and starts a war with a gypsy family; Inspector Campbell carries out a vicious raid.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Thomas schemes to get closer to Billy Kimber at the Cheltenham races, and considers an offer from IRA sympathizers to buy his stolen guns.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: As his war with the Lee family escalates, Thomas harbors suspicions about his brother's fiancée; Campbell pressures the gang to deliver the guns.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Thomas deals with an IRA chief bent on avenging his cousin's death; Grace must decide whether her loyalties lie with Campbell or Thomas.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Thomas prepares to oust Billy Kimber from power, but family secrets that come to light and the obsessed Campbell may prove his undoing.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When Birmingham crime boss Tommy Shelby's beloved Garrison pub is bombed, he finds himself blackmailed into murdering an Irish dissident.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After murdering an Irish dissident, Tommy has no choice but to be a pawn in Inspector Campbell's treacherous political game.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After joining London crime boss Alfie Solomons in a business venture, Tommy worries that Alfie's newly revealed volatility could pose a problem.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The Peaky Blinders take over London's Eden Club; Sabini convinces his old adversary Alfie Solomons to join forces and eradicate the gang.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The Peaky Blinders are under attack. Tommy's power base in London is obliterated, and both Arthur and Michael are arrested and imprisoned.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Tommy plans to execute the mission given to him by Campbell: the assassination of a high-ranking member of the military establishment.
episodes.title: Episode 6
